text: "Sweetness" is a 2002 song recorded by the alternative rock band Jimmy Eat World. "Sweetness" was on their 2001 album Bleed American. It was also featured in the ice hockey video game, NHL 2003.Jimmy Eat World - Bleed American (staff review). Sputnikmusic.com. Retrieved 2010-10-07.THE SOUNDS OF NHL 2003 . EASPORTS.com.
